abstract: Can presidential candidates fit in with the locals at the ultimate down-home event, the Iowa State Fair, in the state with the first nominating contest? Knowing what to eat is part of the challenge.

headline.main: First Draft Focus: It’s Heigh-Ho, Come to the (Iowa) Fair!

snippet: Can presidential candidates fit in with the locals at the ultimate down-home event, the Iowa State Fair, in the state with the first nominating contest? Knowing what to eat is part of the challenge.
